title: Self-Efficacy Enhancement Strategies in Online Learning Environments (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic educational technology tools and language teaching experience
context.additional_context: A short-term intensive course in language education for pre-service and in-service teachers, providing a mobile learning environment based on smartphones in PC-free settings

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized learning pathways in mobile environments
Learners can enhance self-efficacy by 20% or more when utilizing online learning tools
Learners can apply three or more self-directed learning strategies in blended learning environments
Learners can identify five or more self-efficacy enhancement elements when designing online learning in language education contexts
Learners can propose three or more learner engagement enhancement strategies when producing mobile-based microlearning content

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
